product_name: Thorlo Light Hiking Mini Crew Socks - Men's
long_description: These light hiking socks are designed for day hikes in moderate to hot climates on flat to varied terrain. Exclusive fabric blend includes CoolMax(R) polyester and THOR-LON(R) acrylic to wick moisture and keep your feet feeling even cool. Socks also have ventilation panels for better wicking. Moderate cushioning in balls and heels helps to reduce shock, impact, shear and blisters. Light cushioning at insteps and arches provide lace pad pressure protection and improved fit. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: These light hiking socks are designed for day hikes in moderate to hot climates on flat to varied terrain.
